page.title: 19Garden Nurseries.
page.content: There are three nurseries,one of which is called Sheldon Nursery.It is owned by Mr Williams.His son helps to run it.He started a market garden 54 years ago.On his market garden he grows cucumbers and tomatoes.He has 3 employees.He owns 26 acres of land on which he has 4 old timber green houses and 2 new alluminium houses.Each new green houses takes up a quarter of an acre.The second is called Stanboro it started in 1960.They grow plants, trees,shrubs,bedding plants and it is open to the public.There is another nursery in Knightsbridge it is a flower nursery.The flowers are sent all around the world,from the Cheltenham Flower and Vegetable Market. He has three green houses and three acres of land.
